com.ami.mse.ucms.db.manager.template

Interface TemplateManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TemplateManagerImpl

    public interface TemplateManager
    Contains methods that processing instance of Template using EntityManager. There are methods for save and update new or existing instance. Also there are method for extraction existing record of template from the data base.
    Author:
    Tony

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTemplateComponents(Template template, TemplateComponent templateComponent)
      Adds instance of Component to the instance of Template.
      List<Template> findAll()
      Find all existing records of Template that are saved in the data base.
      List<TemplateComponent> findAllComponentForTemplate(Template template)
      Find all existing Component for given Template.
      Template findById(int id)
      Find record of Template by it's id.
      Template findByName(String name)
      Find record of Template by it's name.
      void save(Template template)
      Saves the instance of Template in the data base.
      Template update(Template template)
      Update the instance of Template or saves if the given instance do not exists in the data base.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(Template template)
        Saves the instance of Template in the data base.
        Parameters:
        template - the template that will be saved

      • update

        Template update(Template template)
        Update the instance of Template or saves if the given instance do not exists in the data base.
        Parameters:
        template - the template that will be updated or saved
        Returns:
        the template that is updated or saved.

      • addTemplateComponents

        void addTemplateComponents(Template template,
                         TemplateComponent templateComponent)
        Adds instance of Component to the instance of Template. This method is used to complete the relation between table Template and table Component.
        Parameters:
        template - the template on witch the component is assigned
        templateComponent - the component witch is assigned to the given template

      • findAll

        List<Template> findAll()
        Find all existing records of Template that are saved in the data base.
        Returns:
        the list of all records of Template or empty list if there is none record

      • findById

        Template findById(int id)
        Find record of Template by it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the searched template
        Returns:
        the template that is found or null if there is not exist record with given id

      • findAllComponentForTemplate

        List<TemplateComponent> findAllComponentForTemplate(Template template)
        Find all existing Component for given Template.
        Parameters:
        template - the template for witch will be searched components
        Returns:
        the list of components for the given template or empty list if there is none record of component for the given template

      • findByName

        Template findByName(String name)
        Find record of Template by it's name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name that will be used to search
        Returns:
        record of Template or null if there is not record with the given name
